Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Racine/Belmont
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in via Clark, Racine, Belmont and Clark: due to, street blockage near Racine/Belmont.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed near Belmont
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are standing near Belmont due to a report of a minor fire at track level. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are standing near Belmont due to a report of a minor fire at track level.

Shuttle buses will be available between Southport and Fullerton to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No Trains Between Howard and Fullerton
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Fullerton due to a report of a minor fire at track level.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Fullerton due to a report of a minor fire at track level.

As a result, trains are operating between 95th and Fullerton, and,

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service through the affected area.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
